name: Hoveride Tournament
description:
Speeder/Hover Racing Game

Inspiration is coming from pod races in Star Wars.

This version is only  a prototype for one phase of the game (Race Mode).

An second phase (Sniper) will be develloped in order to come back in the race when dead. 

This game is playable with ps4 Controller or with mouse and keybaord.

PS: Please connect a PS4 controller to run this version ( There is bug if no controller connected)
